Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1A: Backend foundation — config, database, pinyin, provider abstraction

- config.py: loads .env, exposes GEMINI_API_KEY, CHAT_PROVIDER, CHAT_MODEL, DB_PATH
- database.py: init_db\(\) creates chat tables, get_db\(\) async context manager
- chinese/pinyin.py: annotate_pinyin\(\) and pinyin_for_text\(\) via pypinyin
- providers/base.py: abstract ChatProvider + ChatResponse model
- providers/registry.py: get_chat_provider\(\) factory
- models/chat.py: Pydantic request/response models for chat API
- main.py: lifespan hook for DB init, temp /api/debug/pinyin endpoint
- kill-servers.ps1: PowerShell utility to kill dev servers on ports 8000-8009

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
